name: Thinking Of U: A Love Story
name_original: Thinking Of U: A Love Story
description:
"After a long battle with the Dark Lord, Fiona has saved the world from darkness. Now, all she wants to do is relax on her vacation, without any more trouble..."

Length: 15-20 minutes.

Part of my ongoing project to fix and publish all of my older games to itch.io. Back in 2016, I wanted to check out Rpg Maker MV. I hated it. This was the result.

Sadly some changes had to be made in order to post it here. Please don't sue me, Miley Cyrus.

*If the web player doesn't work for you, then try the downloadable version.
